ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B COHOWEB field data from IMPACT and plasma data from PLASTIC
ResourceHeader.Description:
STEREO data in COHOWEB come from the magnetometer of
    the IMPACT package and from the PLASTIC plasma detector.  Principal
    Investigators for these packages are Janet Luhmann (UCB) and Antoinette Galvin
    (UNH), respectively.  Magnetic field  data were obtained as 10-min averages from
    UCLA, courtesy of C.T. Russell. COHOWeb's magnetic field hourly averages were created at
    GSFC/SPDF by averaging over the six 10-min averages falling within each hour. 
    Hourly plasma parameter data were obtained from UNH via
    http://fiji.sr.unh.edu/1dmax_ascii/.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Janet Luhmann, Chris Russell, Antoinette Galvin and NASA GSFC SPDF facility.

TimeSpan.Note:
Exact stop and end dates differ for different instruments'
data.  Lag time of latest data is typically some months.
